Kim Il Chol Meets Nigerian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Il Chol Meets Nigerian Ambassador
    Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Vice-Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Il Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, met and had a talk with Sule Buba, Nigerian ambassador e.p. to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Monday.
 On hand were generals and officers of the KPA and an official of the Nigerian embassy.

Gift to Kim Jong Il from Mozambican President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Mozambican President
    Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from Mozambican President Joaquim Alberto Chissano.
 The gift was handed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, by Leonardo Santos Simao, minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation who is leading the Mozambican government delegation on a visit to the DPRK, on Monday.
